responsibilities: Conducted extensive research on retail sales methodologies, focusing on the SPIN and consultative selling techniques to improve conversion rates.
Analyzed regional market trends and consumer behavior patterns within high-traffic shopping centers to identify successful merchandising strategies.
Evaluated Point of Sale (POS) system functionalities and inventory management best practices through independent study and software tutorials.
Studied de-escalation protocols and customer service frameworks used by industry-leading retail brands to handle complex consumer interactions.
Applied research-based communication strategies to assist visitors with inquiries, ensuring a high level of satisfaction.
Maintained organized documentation of available resources, utilizing inventory categorization skills learned through retail field research.

metadata.experience_level: Relevant research done for the job field.
